answers.answer: I wouldn't worry just yet.I failed my 1 hour but passed the 3 hour test.Don't expect anything is my best advice.  Breathe,  think positive and go with the flow.  Don't get worked up over the unknown! You could have had an off week... even if you have to have a c - section,  you'll be okay :)

question: didn't pass my glucose test now i have to take the test again and this time it'll be a 4 hour wait:/I gained like 10 pounds in a week my doctor told me most likely ill be getting a c section if the baby is to big im scared idk what to expect now:/
title: gestational diabetes?
